articles.title: Greetings to Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua
articles.content:
Greetings to Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greeting to the National Leadership of the Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua on Saturday on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of the victory in the Sandinist people's revolution.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the WPK and the front would continue growing strong, sincerely wishing the front bigger success in the work to defend the gains of revolution and achieve the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Efforts Focused on Preventing Flood Damage
articles.content:
Efforts Focused on Preventing Flood Damage
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A work for preventing flood damage is making rapid progress in different parts of the DPRK.
					 Streams extending dozens of kilometers were dredged, earth removed and feldspars laid to reinforce banks.
					
					 Efforts are being directed to projects for preventing landslind.
					
					 Roads are being repaired in all provinces.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces U.S. for Conducting First Test Flight of Bomber Carrying New Type Nuclear Bomb
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces U.S. for Conducting First Test Flight of Bomber Carrying New Type Nuclear Bomb
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently conducted the first test flight of a bomber carrying new type nuclear bomb B61-12.
					 It was reported that beside the test conducted under the supervision of the U.S. Nuclear Security Agency and its Air Force, two more tests are expected within this year.
					
					 The U.S. squandered a stupendous amount of funds every year for implementing its plan for modernizing nuclear weapons and is contemplating spending one trillion U.S. dollars for modernizing land-based missiles, SLBM and long-range bombers.
					
					 The increased spurs put by the U.S. to the modernization of nuclear force are quite contrary to its talk about building "a world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 After making the above-said initiative Washington kicked up much fuss, holding an international summit for nuclear security, discussing an issue of "nuclear disarmament" with Russia and opening to public the number of the stockpiled nuclear warheads in an effort to create impression that it was set to put it into practice without delay.
					
					 This, however, proved fruitless.
					
					 It is the unanimous view of experts that the peace and security of the world are at greater peril than ever before.
					
					 This is attributable to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. declared that it would maintain "safe and effective nuclear deterrence" in March, 2010 after reneging on its commitment to decrease the role of nuclear weapons in carrying out its national security strategy.      It also broke its promise to put an end to the production of nuclear fissile materials for manufacturing nuclear weapons. Even at this time it is keeping its nuclear weapons factories in full operation. It conducted a series of sub-critical nuclear tests and tests to examine capabilities of nuclear weapons by use of plutonium in September and December, 2010, February, 2011 and December, 2012.
					
					 The U.S. staged madcap nuclear war drills against the DPRK every year by massively introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea and the waters off it. Recently its bombers flew even to Australia and staged a drill of dropping nuclear bombs, gravely threatening peace and security in Asia.
					
					 The situation in Europe also remains tenser than ever before due to U.S. ceaseless nuclear war exercises with NATO forces involved and arms buildup.
					
					 It was reported that the above-said test of B61-12 was aimed to replace aging nuclear bombs deployed in Europe with it.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. remains unchanged in its ambition for building a unipolar world and it considers nukes as a basic means to carry out its scenario.
					
					 The U.S. loud-mouthed elimination of nukes is little different from such sophism that a leopard can change its spots.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists can never change its sinister design to dominate the world with its unchallenged nuclear edge.
					
					 The appearance of various nuclear weapons states put an end to the era of the U.S. nuclear monopoly.
					
					 The U.S., chiefly responsible for nuclear development and proliferation, is working hard to deter the nuclear powers from developing nukes and other countries from having access to nuclear weapons under such deceptive slogan as "building of a world without nuclear weapons" in a bid to realize its ambition for world domination.
					
					 In its report on "quadrennial defense strategy review" in 2010 the U.S. clarified its stand to keep its nuclear arsenal till it attains its goal for building the "world without nuclear weapons."
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. loud-mouthed "world without nuclear weapons" is, in essence, no more than a smokescreen to cover up its hegemonic ambition as it aims at the world dominated by its nukes.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer talk about the "world without nuclear weapons" before mankind desirous of living in a peaceful world and immediately halt its criminal moves for modernizing nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Red Herring
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Group's Talk about "Dialogue" Red Herring
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are busy these days talking about "dialogue" in a bid to mislead public opinion. On July 10 Park Geun Hye made disgusting remarks before riff-raffs of the "Preparatory Committee for Unification" that the south keeps "the door of dialogue and cooperation open" and it "is waiting for the north to come out for dialogue". Traitor Hong Yong Phyo and other gentries of the puppet Ministry of Unification are letting loose a string of balderdash whenever chances present themselves that the south "will not give up dialogue" and it is "its basic stand to have dialogue". Coteries of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the "National Assembly" are vying with each other to create impressions that the south is interested in the north-south dialogue, trumpeting about "efforts for resuming dialogue" and "response".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The "dialogue" much touted by the south Korean puppet group is a shameless red herring of heinous confrontation maniacs.
					
					 The group is claiming that it has worked for dialogue and cooperation with the north but it is a sheer lie to make profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 The group has never stood for sincere dialogue but worked with blood shot eyes to derail it.
					
					 It was none other than the puppet group which aborted the joint national event marking the 15th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 "Dialogue" touted by the group is nothing but shameless chicanery to cover up its criminal scenario for confrontation with the north and further intensify provocations against it.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the group's loud-mouthed "dialogue" is a call for escalating the confrontation with the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Her Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Her Reckless Remarks against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive jabbered "it is hard to predict when and what the north may provoke," talking about its international and domestic situations. She went the lengths of talking nonsense that the north may "deliberately escalate tension" in a bid to divert elsewhere "its inhabitants' discontent" caused by drought.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 This is the symptoms of doom of the fools keen to break the single-minded unity of the DPRK through plots and fabrications and realize their daydream of achieving "unification of social systems".
					
					 No matter what invectives the puppet group of traitors may let loose, the DPRK will remain unfazed.
					
					 With no false propaganda can the puppet group tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and bar its service personnel and people from dynamically advancing along the road of Juche and Songun.
					
					 The puppet forces will never be able to grasp this truth before they perish as they regard it as the mode of their existence to kowtow to their U.S. master and as pleasure to be under his backing.
					
					 The DPRK will wipe out all those who try to bring down the inviolable social system of the DPRK, no matter where they are in hiding.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime's Suppression Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime's Suppression Protested
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet security authorities are keen on suppressing the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, a progressive civic organization.
					 They hurled more than 100 fascist policemen belonging to the puppet Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency on July 15 into searching the office of the organization, the venue of sit-in strike of members of its leadership, printing house and three other places on the suspicion of "formation of enemy-benefiting organization".
					
					 They issued warrants of arrest for its ten leading members, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere.
					
					 They arrested Kang Sun Yong, member of the education committee of the organization, and threatened to walk off nine other persons.
					
					 The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, the Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations against Suppression under the Pretext of Security, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the "Christian Pastors' Group for Peaceful Action" and other civic, public and religious organizations held a press conference at the Christian church in Seoul at which they strongly protested against the fascist police's suppression.
					
					 The police's repressive action against the Korea solidarity was reminiscent of the suppression under the "yusin" fascist regime, the organizations held.
					
					 They noted that the Korea solidarity launched action after forming the second group of sit-in strikers, adding the suppression under the pretext of security is bound to lead to ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Flayed for Illegal Surveillance
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Flayed for Illegal Surveillance
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Minjok Ilbo, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on July 1 denounced the puppet regime's illegal surveillance.
					 It was disclosed that the puppet Intelligence Service purchased a hacking system from overseas and has used it for the purpose of surveillance, the editorial said, and continued:
					
					 The hacking system is capable to monitoring not only computer data but its position and dialogue in real time.
					
					 It was also disclosed that the Defense Security Command purchased eavesdropping equipment in October, 2010.
					
					 The Intelligence Service's claim that the hacking system is aimed to conduct "intelligence warfare against the north" is little short of the U.S. forces' hypocritical talk that their anthrax germ experiments were designed to deter "germ attack of the north".
					
					 There can be neither democratization nor future in society where people are subject to strict watch and control by the dictatorial power.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Italy
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Italy
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed in Rome on July 10. 
					 The director of the international department of the Communist Party of Italy was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the above-said anniversaries.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The July 7th issue of the Indonesian newspaper International Daily allotted one whole page to articles illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The paper said in its article titled "Idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung will last forever":
					
					 The President was the most prominent incarnation of virtues.
					
					 The history does not know such person as the President who valued and loved the people so much.
					
					 Indeed, he was the most prominent leader representing the 20th century, peerlessly great man and great sage of humankind.
					
					 The July 6th issue of the Bangladeshi newspaper Blits carried an article titled "Father of the people" illustrated with a photo of the President.
					
					 It noted: The President was not only the leader of the country but the great father who looked after the people's destiny in a responsible manner. He regarded it as his primary obligation to take care of the people.
					
					 The July 8th issue of the Kuwaiti newspaper Al-Anba carried an article illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It said he founded the Juche idea and Songun idea and successfully embodied them, making immortal contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given by the United Left Movement of Dominica, the Communist Party of Italy, the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa from July 3 to 6 in commemoration of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Jose Miguel Mejia, secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica, said that the President was the prominent leader who freed the Korean people from the yoke of colonial slavery of the Japanese imperialists and defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressors and built a rich and powerful socialist state on the war debris.
					
					 The director of the international department of the Communist Party of Italy said the Italian revolutionaries recollect with deep emotion the exploits the President performed for the Korean revolution and the global cause of noble independence. 
					
					 The chairman of the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK said the President singled out independence, peace and friendship as the foreign policy tenet of the DPRK and steadily expanded the relations with other countries through his energetic activities, making undying contributions to the non-aligned movement and the cause of global independence. 
					
					 The secretary of the Northern Area of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa said the Juche idea, Songun idea fathered by the President is the guiding idea of the revolution whose validity and vitality have been clearly proved and the noble mental pabulum common to mankind.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Austria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Austria
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Austrian Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released a statement on July 8, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said;
					
					 The President dedicated his whole life to the country and its people.
					
					 He started the struggle to free Korea from the colonial yoke of the Japanese imperialists in his teens.
					
					 After national liberation he took lots of state measures to improve the Korean people's living standard.
					
					 When the U.S. imperialists launched an invasion of the DPRK, he wisely led the Korean People's Army and all Korean people to victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and successfully steered the postwar socialist construction.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by him is the guiding idea of great significance for the world progressives aspiring after freedom and independence.
					
					 He put forward many fair and aboveboard proposals for the peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Syria
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Syria
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of Syria made public a statement on July 7 in support of the Korean people's cause of national reunification. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The adoption of the north-south joint declaration in June, 2000 was a historic event in promoting dialogue and practical actions for the building of a reunified prospering nation and achieving the reunification of the Korean nation by defusing tension, putting an end to the danger of war and creating peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula, resolving differences and improving the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The declaration is in full line with the idea clarified by HE Marshal Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address for 2015. 
					
					 The leadership and the people of Syria support the statement of the DPRK government issued on June 15, 2015 and all its efforts for overcoming all hurdles and barriers blocking the reunification of the great Korean nation and the improvement of the north-south relations including foreign interference under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Syrian leadership supports the noble intention of the DPRK leadership to achieve the reunification of Korea on the basis of historic facts of the Korean nation and its strong wishes to live in a reunified state and contribute to the development of human civilization.

articles.title: PTC felicita victoria de revolucion popular sandinista
articles.content:
PTC felicita victoria de revolucion popular sandinista
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 36o aniversario de la victoria de la revolucion popular sandinista, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion a la Direccion Nacional del Frente Sandinista de Liberacion Nacional de Nicaragua (FSLN).
					La misiva expresa conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PTC y el FSLN se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran tambien en lo adelante y formula votos de todo corazon por mayores exitos en el trabajo del FSLN para defender las conquistas de la revolucion y lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: No se cambia jamas la naturaleza bestial de EE.UU., comenta ACNC
articles.content:
No se cambia jamas la naturaleza bestial de EE.UU., comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos realizo la primera prueba de vuelo de bomba nuclear B61-12 bajo los auspicios de la Agencia de Seguridad Nuclear Nacional y las fuerzas aereas del pais y preve hacerla dos veces mas dentro de este ano. 
					El imperio desembolsa cada ano enormes fondos para el cumplimiento del plan de modernizacion de armas nucleares y quiere malgastar un billon de US$ a la modernizacion de misiles terrestres, los SLBM y los bombarderos de largo alcance. 
					
					La modernizacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de EE.UU. contraviene a su insistencia en el "mundo sin armas nucleares".
					
					Como es conocido por todos, EE.UU. presento en el ano 2009 el proyecto sobre el "mundo sin armas nucleares" cuya meta es disminuir el papel de armas nucleares en el cumplimiento de la estrategia de seguridad nacional, acabar con la produccion de sustancias de fision nuclear para la fabricacion de armas nucleares y hacer esfuerzos para que el Congreso consintiera el Tratado Comprensivo de Prohibicion de Pruebas Nucleares. 
					
					Y armo alboroto como si lo llevara a efecto de inmediato insistiendo en convocar la Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear, discutir el problema de "desarme nuclear" con Rusia y dar a la publicidad la cantidad de las ojivas nucleares, pero en vano. 
					
					Los especialistas estiman unanimemente que la paz y la seguridad del mundo se ven mas amenazadas que antes, debido a EE.UU. 
					
					A contrapelo de su promesa de reducir el papel de armas nucleares en el cumplimiento de la estrategia de seguridad nacional, EE.UU. anuncio en marzo de 2010 que "mantendra el disuasivo nuclear seguro y eficiente".
					
					Tambien, revoco la otra promesa de dejar la produccion de sustancias de fision nuclear. Ahora pone en pleno funcionamiento las fabricas de armas nucleares y realizo en septiembre y diciembre de 2010, en febrero de 2011, en diciembre de 2012 y en otras ocasiones las pruebas de armas nucleares incluso las subcriticas. 
					
					Cada ano libra en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC introduciendo enorme cantidad de armas nucleares y amenaza gravemente la paz y la seguridad de Asia desarrollando hasta en Australia las pruebas de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares. 
					
					EE.UU. agrava cada dia mas la situacion de Europa librando los incesantes ejercicios de guerra nuclear y las maniobras de aumento de las fuerzas armadas movilizando las de la OTAN.
					
					Dicen que el presente ensayo tambien se realizo bajo el objetivo de sustituir las viejas bombas nucleares emplazadas  en Europa por las de nuevo tipo.
					
					La realidad demuestra que la ambicion de la dominacion del mundo unipolar de EE.UU. no se ha cambiado nunca y el medio principal para realizarla es armas nucleares como en el tiempo pasado.
					
					Es absurda la sofisteria de EE.UU. de eliminar las armas nucleares.
					
					No se puede cambiar jamas la intencion malsana del imperialismo yanqui de dominar el mundo con la superioridad absoluta de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Ya termino la epoca de monopolio nuclear de EE.UU. por la aparicion de los paises con las armas nucleares.
					
					Por esta razon, EE.UU., caudillo del desarrollo y proliferacion nucleares, intentan realizar a toda costa la dominacion del mundo al frenar el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de otras potencias nucleares y no permitir tener las armas nucleares a otros paises bajo la consigna enganosa "mundo libre de armas nucleares".
					
					Practicamente, EE.UU. publico claramente en el "reporte cuatrienal de la estrategia de defensa" fechado 2010, que seguira manteniendo su arsenal nuclear hasta que se logre el "mundo libre de las armas nucleares".
					
					Esto comprueba que los disparates de EE.UU. sobre el "mundo libre de las armas nucleares" son para perseguir el mundo en que quede solo las armas nucleares de EE.UU. y no pasan de ser una cortina para encubrir la ambicion dominacionista.
					
					EE.UU. no debe hablar mas del "mundo libre de armas nucleares" ante la humanidad que quiere vivir en el mundo pacifico sino cesar de inmediato las maniobras criminales de la modernizacion de las armas nucleares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica de farsa disparates de "dialogo" de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica de farsa disparates de "dialogo" de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, las autoridades surcoreanas no cesan de hablar tanto del "dialogo" para desviar la opinion publica. En una reunion del "Comite Preparatorio de Unificacion" convocada el dia 10, Park Geun-hye dijo que el Sur de Corea "tiene abierta la puerta del dialogo y cooperacion" y "espera que el Norte salga al dialogo". Por otra parte, Hong Yong Phyo y otros compinches del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea pronunciaron en varias ocasiones que "no abandonaran el dialogo" y "hacer el dialogo es su posicion principal".  Tambien, la gentuza de la cancilleria y del "Asamblea Nacional" habla de los "esfuerzos por reanudar el dialogo" y la "respuesta" de alguien como si tuviera algun interes en las conversaciones Norte-Sur.
					Estas palabrerias de los titeres surcoreanos devienen un acto enganoso para desviar la opinion publica de los tipejos enfrascados en el enfrentamiento.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 18 y continua:
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas fingen actuando como si han venido esforzandose por el dialogo y las cooperaciones, lo cual no pasa de ser la descarada mentira que convierte lo blanco en lo negro.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no desearon jamas el dialogo, sino maniobraron para llevarlo al fracaso.
					
					Ellas son quienes destruyeron los actos conjuntos de la nacion por el 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos hablan del "dialogo" para encubrir su intento criminal de enfrentamiento y fortalecer mas la  provocacion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran patentemente que los disparates del "dialogo" de los titeres surcoreanos son los de enfrentamiento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparate anti-RPDC de mandataria surcoreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparate anti-RPDC de mandataria surcoreana
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la mandataria surcoreana dijo que "es imprevisible cuando y cual provocacion cometeria el Norte de Corea" cuestionando la situacion interior y exterior de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Y disparateo que "el Norte de Corea podria agravar intencionalmente la situacion para apaciguar el descontento de los moradores causado por la sequia". 
					En un comentario individual de este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de esfuerzos agonicos de los estupidos por debilitar con las intrigas la unidad monolitica de la RPDC y lograr la ambicion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes". 
					
					Por mas que los traidores surcoreanos se aferren a los complots anti-RPDDC, no podran deshonrar el digno prestigio de la RPDC ni detener a los militares y civiles coreanos que marchan por el camino del Juche, el de Songun. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos aniquilaran a todos los que se atrevan a denigrar el regimen norcoreano, aunque se escondan en cualquier rincon de este mundo.
